description: System-generated unique identifier for the account record.
Code or number used to identify the account in the chart of accounts; exact format may vary—confirm with SME.
Human-readable title of the account shown in user interfaces and reports.
Coded reference indicating the account’s category (e.g., asset, liability, revenue, expense).
Code for the organization or business unit that owns or manages this account.
Coded status of the account (e.g., active, inactive, closed) controlling whether it can be posted to.
Identifier of the parent account when this record is a subaccount, supporting hierarchical chart-of-accounts structure.
Mapping to a tax reporting line or code used in filings and tax reports; likely configurable—confirm with SME.
Free-text notes describing the account’s purpose, usage, or other remarks.
Grouping key linking this account to a category in an external system for integration; confirm with SME.
Identifier of the corresponding account in an external accounting/ERP system for synchronization.
Identifier of the user who created this account record.
Date and time when this account record was created.
Identifier of the user who last modified this account record.
Date and time of the most recent update to this account record.
